welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Blanchard, a charming city known for its stunning natural beauty and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Will Rogers World Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Will Rogers World Airport, mainly serving regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport is the hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wiley Post Airport provides check-in, baggage claim, and boarding services for all airlines.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wiley Post Airport offers exclusive services for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tinker AFB Airport serves both civilian and military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
